title: All my Calendar data has disappeared
content: When I logged in today after a few days away I realised I was not getting any Task Reminders, although there should have been several for repeating tasks which were due whilst I was away. On looking in the Calendar window I found that all the Tasks had disappeared. How do I get them back? (I do have the computer backed up with Macrium Reflect, so I could restore the file(s) from last week, but I have no idea where the Calendar data is stored.)
creator: pfvincent

title: There was a popup box showing messages being fetched from server when Get Messages was chosen.
content: Older versions of Thunderbird 'Get Messages' provided a popup window in the lower corner showing messages being downloaded. It's gone. How can I get that option?

title: Thunderbird and Optus Emails
content: I recently stopped receiving my Optusnet emails via Thunderbird, although I can still receive them via Optus webmail. As previous users have found out, changes were made to Optus's platform which didn't support Thunderbird, all without notifying customers. However, after lengthy discussions with Optus, they have assured me that they now support Thunderbird and after checking all the settings I should be able to receive emails via Thunderbird. However this is not the case and I am still relying on webmail. Does anyone have any ideas? Thanks in advance. aandr1
creator: aandr1

title: Different view of emails coming in only in links and text
content: Want to why this is the second time after an update that my emails have gone to only showing web links and not the actual email content i.e. images and text. Plus how do I change it back as not very tech savvy and don't want to have to save yet another file of these old emails to set up again to get them as readable visual emails not links. Have to go to a link to see the emails correctly this is not good when they could contain not wanted information.
creator: chezbaa7

title: Recovering deleted emails
content: I accidentally deleted the emails in the all mail folder and now everything is gone from in box and sent. I have unsubscribed from the all mail tab. I have also tried the suggestions given in the help section. Nothing is helping. Can you please help? Thanks, Sue sthist.st@gmail.com

title: Cannot authenticate to outlook
content: Hi, I recently had an office location change and post that in my office laptop, Thunderbird cannot authenticate with outlook and collect mails from it. IT team tried syncing the password from their end, and we tried a million other things like checking server settings in Thunderbird etc, but nothing is working. It just says "connecting to outlook.office365.com...." and is stuck there.

title: I can't read emails saved in different locations.

See attached a screen shot of an email which opened in Thunderbird has content but saved elsewhere and opened no longer has it.

I would be grateful to anyone who can help me. Thank you so much.

Sabina

title: While adding a Gmail account, no popup shows, failed suddenly.
content:
Preliminary: 1. I need to use proxy to visit `gmail.com` 2. The proxy setting in Thunderbird was tried with "Use system," "Auto-detect," and "Manual." but none of these worked. 3. The proxy setting in Firefox works well. (by visiting `gmail.com` and then `mail.google.com` redirected)

Issue:

As shown in the images, neither Account Creation page nor the new Account Hub is working. They found configurations of Gmail in Mozilla ISPDB, but when I pressed 'continue', no popup window appeared, and an failure suddenly occurred (just in several milliseconds): "Authentication error. Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password."

title: Imap takes up too much space on my harddisk
content:
I have 8 different emails in my Thunderbird. Some of them holds quite huge correspondances. I have all emails set up as Imap. I have plenty of space on my server.

My computer guy tells me there is a bug somewhere that keeps piling up emails to take up much more space on the computer than on the server. We have deleted the program twice and it happens again, and again.

What can I do? Can I use Thunderbird as webmail?

I have just downloaded Thunderbird on my phone as well. Is that what caused the problem this time.

How do I solve my problem.

Thank you in advance for your assistance
creator: mette1

title: Recupero profili da HDD su altro pc
content: Buongiorno a tutti, ho questo problema. Il mio pc (molto datato) su cui era installato Thunderbird con quattro diversi account si è spento definitivamente. Non ho quindi modo di recuperare gli account direttamente da Thunderbird e dal pc (con Windows 10) su cui era installato. Ho estratto l'HDD, funzionante, e ho provato a collegarlo tramite adattatore usb ad un portatile con Windows 11. L'HDD viene letto normalmente ma nella cartella Mozilla Thunderbird, naturalmente, non ci sono i profili salvati. C'è un modo, in questa situazione (HDD collegato ad un altro pc con altro Windows), per recuperare i miei profili salvati e le relative mail, dal momento che non posso risalire al percorso delle cartelle nel pc d'origine? Grazie mille a chi vorrà aiutarmi!
creator: khabal2002

title: Accept option for meeting invitations
content: When I received an email with an invitation for a meeting, I used to be shown an 'accept' button to indicate acceptance of the meeting invitation. This 'accept' button no longer appears. Is there I setting I must set for the accept button to appear?
creator: andros2

title: Aucun message trouvé dans un dossier qui en contient
content: Souhaitant déplacer les messages du dossier "B" vers le dossier "A", j'ai surligné tous les mails du dossier "B" et j'ai déplacé l'ensemble des message en les faisant glisser vers le dossier "A" qui n'avait aucun message à sa racine. Le résultat est que le dossier "A" qui n'avait aucun message à sa racine bien qu'ayant à présent en information 6 messages non lus et 11 message au total, n'en contient aucun. Par contre ces messages sont toujours dans leur dossier d'origine "B". Question n° 1 : Faire glisser des message d'un dossier vers un autre n'est il pas possible ? Question n° 2 : Comment faire disparaitre du dossier "A" l'information 6 messages non lus et 11 message au total ? Avec mes remerciements. Cordialement Roger DESPAGNE +33 (0) 609 499 500
creator: roger.despagne

title: "scarica messaggi" disabilitare un account
content:
buongiorno, in Thunderbird nella sezione account ho un indirizzo in cui ho disabilitato tutte le opzioni di download della posta e ho cancellato la PW di accesso, e correttamente Thunderbird non cerca la posta di quell'account quando fa il check automatico. se invece io clicco su "scarica messaggi", mi compare la richiesta di pw per l'account disabilitato. di qui la domanda: c'è modo di togliere un account da quelli di cui Thunderbird fa il check quando si clicca su "scarica messaggi"? (il fatto di cliccare col secondario su "scarica messaggi" e scelgiere da dove si vuol scaricare non mi serve perché ho 8 account di cui voglio controllare la posta in 7)

grazie dell'aiuto Maurizio
creator: m.lana
